A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Its a slap in the face to fans. Also forced love for new characters. Obviously the fans have spoken. Usually RT critic reviews are lower than audience. Audience score speaks volumes here. \nIf you know nothing about Star Wars this was a fun film to watch. If you watched the original Trilogy this is garbage. I cant imagine what someone whom watched the original trilogy in their teens and is now in their 50s are feeling. Disgust. Waited almost 40 years for this?
